name: Hopper Rabbit
description:
Hopper Rabbit

Story:

The colorful epic world of Hopper Rabbit is appealing not only to children but also to you.

In this world you must find six keys and unlock locked doors without getting caught by the enemies and save your captive queen. The fate of your country lies on your shoulders!..

Gameplay and Key Features:

  • Epic atmosphere
  • Open world gameplay
  • Standard fps mechanics and
  • Additionally playable as tps
  • Action - adventure
  • A different perspective on platform games


Developer's Note:

The other stages of our project, which we continue to develop as an indie team, will be with you in the forthcoming years as VR, iOS, and Android support as well as multiplayer adaptation of games.
